Service Flows

Category 1

  • Breakfast / Lunch / Dinner


1. Welcome Drinks and Wine Lists
2. No Drink & Meal order
3. After Take Off
4. No linen / Only on Multi sector
5. Meal Tray Delivery Fwd - Aft
6. Hot Beverages Fwd - Aft
7. Meal Tray Clearance
8. Final Clearance
9. Hot Towels

Category 2

  • Breakfast / Lunch / Dinner

1. Welcome Drinks and Wine Lists
2. Drink and Meal Order
3.After Take Off
4. Table Linen Fwd - Aft
5. Meal Tray Delivery Fwd - Aft
6. Hot Beverages Fwd - Aft
7. Bread Basket Fwd - Aft
8. Meal Tray Clearance
9. Final Clearance
10. Hot Towels

Category 3

  • Breakfast after Take off
  • Breakfast Before Landing
  • Lunch / Dinner
1. Meal order on ground (Drinks on request)
2. Take Off
3. Drinks Delivery Fwd - Aft (On request)
4. Drink Clearance
5. Table Linen Fwd - Aft
6. Meal Tray Delivery Fwd - Aft
7. Drink Basket Fwd - Aft
8. Hot Beverages Fwd - Aft
9. Bread Basket Fwd - Aft
10. 2nd round of Hot Beverages Fwd - Aft
11. Meal Tray Clearance
12. Final Clearance
13. Hot Towels

2. Hot Towels
